code: @Manual{,   title = {ukbabynames: UK Baby Names Data},   author = {Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel and Thomas J. Leeper and Nicholas Goguen-Compagnoni and Sara Lemus},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.2.0},   url = {https://mine-cetinkaya-rundel.github.io/ukbabynames/}, }

title: UK Baby Names Data
text: package contains five datasets: ewbabynames: year 1996 2019, number children sex given name England Wales. names 3 uses included. Provided UK Office National Statistics. nibabynames: year 1997 2018, number children sex given name Northern Ireland. Provided Northern Ireland Statistics Research Agency. scotbabynames: year 1974 2020, number children sex given name Scotland. Provided National Records Scotland. ukbabynames: datasets bound one dataset added nation column based dataset came . rankings: longitudinal dataset containing top-100 baby girl top-100 baby boy names period 1904 1994, England Wales. inspired Hadley Wickham’s babynames package.

title: UK Baby Names Data
text: can install released version ukbabynames CRAN : can install development version openintro GitHub :

title: England & Wales baby names — ewbabynames
text: Full baby name data 1996 2020 England Wales Office National Statistics.

title: England & Wales baby names — ewbabynames
text: data frame 294,801 observations 6 variables. year year (1996-2020). sex Sex, M male F female. name name. n Count name within year sex. rank Rank name within year sex. nation Nation data source: England & Wales.

title: England & Wales baby names — ewbabynames
text: Office National Statistics. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Girls. Office National Statistics. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Boys.

title: England & Wales baby names — ewbabynames
text: data released Office National Statistics Open Government License v3.0.

title: England & Wales baby names — ewbabynames
code: library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union  ewbabynames %>%   filter(name == "Nicholas") %>%   ggplot(aes(x = year, y = n)) +   geom_line() +   labs(     title = "Popularity of the name `Nicholas` in England & Wales",      x = "Year",      y = "Number of babies"     )

title: Northern Ireland baby names — nibabynames
text: Full baby name data 1997 2020 Northern Ireland Northern Ireland Statistics Research Agency.

title: Northern Ireland baby names — nibabynames
text: data frame 22,596 observations 6 variables. year year (1997-2020). sex Sex, M male F female. name name. n Count name within year sex. rank Rank name within year sex. nation Nation data source: Northern Ireland.

title: Northern Ireland baby names — nibabynames
text: Northern Ireland Statistics Research Agency. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Boys Girls.

title: Northern Ireland baby names — nibabynames
code: library(ggplot2) library(dplyr)  nibabynames %>%   filter(name == "Joseph") %>%   ggplot(aes(x = year, y = n)) +   geom_line() +   labs(     title = "Popularity of the name `Joseph` in Northern Ireland",      x = "Year", y = "Number of babies"     )

what: England & Wales top-100 baby names by year — rankings
title: England & Wales top-100 baby names by year — rankings
text: longitudinal dataset containing top-100 baby girl top-100 baby boy names period 1904 1994.

title: England & Wales top-100 baby names by year — rankings
England & Wales top-100 baby names by year — rankings
text: data frame 1,900 observations 4 variables. name name. year year (1904-1994). Rankings based upon births within decade. rank Rank name within decade. sex Sex, M male F female.

title: England & Wales top-100 baby names by year — rankings
text: Office National Statistics. 2016. Top 100 Baby Names Historical Data.

title: England & Wales top-100 baby names by year — rankings
text: data released Office National Statistics Open Government License v3.0.

title: Scotland baby names — scotbabynames
text: Full baby name data 1974 2020 Scotland National Records Scotland.

title: Scotland baby names — scotbabynames
text: data frame 248,420 observations 6 variables. year year (1974-2020). sex Sex, M male F female. name name. n Count name within year sex. rank Rank name within year sex. nation Nation data source: Scotland.

title: Scotland baby names — scotbabynames
text: National Records Scotland. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Boys Girls.

title: Scotland baby names — scotbabynames
code: library(ggplot2) library(dplyr)  scotbabynames %>%   filter(name == "Ava") %>%   ggplot(aes(x = year, y = n)) +   geom_line() +   labs(     title = "Popularity of the name `Ava` in England & Wales",      x = "Year", y = "Number of babies"     )

title: UK baby names — ukbabynames
text: Full baby name data 1974-2020 United Kingdom nations. Contains data England Wales (ewbabynames), Scotland (scotbabynames), Northern Ireland (nibabynames).

title: UK baby names — ukbabynames
text: data frame 565,817 observations 6 variables. year year (1974-2020). sex Sex, M male F female. name name. n Count name within year sex. rank Rank name within year sex. nation Nation data source.

title: UK baby names — ukbabynames
text: Office National Statistics. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Girls. Office National Statistics. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Boys. Northern Ireland Statistics Research Agency. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Boys Girls. National Records Scotland. 2021. Baby Names Statistics Boys Girls.

title: UK baby names — ukbabynames
code: library(ggplot2) library(dplyr)  ukbabynames %>%   filter(name == "Jack") %>%   ggplot(aes(x = year, y = n, color = nation)) +   geom_line() +   labs(      title = "Popularity of the name `Jack` in the UK",      subtitle = "by Nation",       x = "Year", y = "Number of babies",  color = NULL      )

title: ukbabynames 0.3.0
text: Added new author DESCRIPTION. Updated nibabynames, ewbabynames 2020 data. Updated tests added data.

title: ukbabynames 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-04-22 Added new authors changed maintainer DESCRIPTION. ukbabynames now contains data UK nations: England & Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland. New datasets ewnbabynames, scotbabynames, nibabynames individual nation data. data updated 2020 recent year available. Added new tests new data.

title: ukbabynames 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2017-06-20 Fixed spelling error DESCRIPTION. Corrected variables classes rankings.

title: ukbabynames 0.1.0
text: Initial release
